name: idea-tracker
title: Idea Tracker
description: Capture project ideas, append feature bullets in seconds, and export the latest thinking as Markdown without leaving Raycast.
author: mwielondek

commands.name: list-projects
commands.title: List Projects
commands.subtitle: Projects
commands.description: Review projects, append features, and export Markdown.

commands.name: add-project
commands.title: Add Project
commands.subtitle: Projects
commands.description: Capture a new project with tags and starter features.

commands.name: append-feature
commands.title: Append Feature
commands.subtitle: Projects
commands.description: Append a feature bullet to an existing project.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
